de.fuberlin.panda.api.jersey

Class DataExcelResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fuberlin.panda.api.jersey.DataExcelResource

  • public class DataExcelResource
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the data resource class for processing HTTP requests to excel files. Example URL: http://localhost:8080/PANDA/rest/Data/xls/test/0/8/1 to request value of cell with sheet number 1, row number 9 and column B of test.xls
    Author:
    Christoph Schröder

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addCellValXML(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Cell cell, ExchangeXML xmlDoc)
      This method processes the value of a cell if existent according to different value types in excel and adds it to the JAXB class object for XML response.

      • getSingleValue

        public ExchangeXML getSingleValue(java.lang.String FileType,
                         java.lang.String FileName,
                         int SheetNum,
                         int RowNum,
                         int ColNum)
                           throws javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException
        Parameters:
        FileType - - xls or xlsx
        FileName - - filename of excel file
        SheetNum - - index of addressed sheet
        RowNum - - index of row
        ColNum - - index of column
        Returns:
        ExchangeXML - JAXB class for XML response
        Throws:
        javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException - in case resource not found (HTTP 404) or semantic error while processing resource (HTTP 422)

      • addCellValXML

        public static void addCellValXML(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Cell cell,
                 ExchangeXML xmlDoc)
                          throws javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException
        This method processes the value of a cell if existent according to different value types in excel and adds it to the JAXB class object for XML response.
        Parameters:
        Cell - - reference to requested cell
        ExchangeXML - - reference to JAXB class object used for Response
        Throws:
        javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException - in case resource not found (HTTP 404) or semantic error while processing resource (HTTP 422)
